fields.label: Allow Skillset To Read File Data
fields.tooltip: If true, will create a path //document//file_data that is an object representing the original file data downloaded from your blob data source.

fields.label: Data To Extract
fields.tooltip: Specifies the data to extract from Azure blob storage.

fields.label: Delimited Text Delimiter
fields.tooltip: For CSV blobs, specifies the end-of-line single-character delimiter for CSV files where each line starts a new document.

fields.label: Delimited Text Headers
fields.tooltip: For CSV blobs, specifies a comma-delimited list of column headers.

fields.label: Document Root
fields.tooltip: For JSON arrays, specify a path to the array.

fields.label: Excluded File Name Extensions
fields.tooltip: Comma-delimited list of filename extensions to ignore when processing from Azure blob storage.

fields.label: Execution Environment
fields.tooltip: Specifies the environment in which the indexer should execute.

fields.label: Fail On Unprocessable Document
fields.tooltip: For Azure blobs, set to false if you want to continue indexing if a document fails indexing.

fields.label: Fail On Unsupported Content Type
fields.tooltip: For Azure blobs, set to false if you want to continue indexing when an unsupported content type is encountered.

fields.label: First Line Contains Headers
fields.tooltip: For CSV blobs, indicates that the first (non-blank) line of each blob contains headers.

fields.label: Image Action
fields.tooltip: Determines how to process embedded images and image files in Azure blob storage.

fields.label: Index Storage Metadata Only For Oversized Documents
fields.tooltip: For Azure blobs, set this property to true to still index storage metadata for blob content that is too large to process.

fields.label: Indexed File Name Extensions
fields.tooltip: Comma-delimited list of filename extensions to select when processing from Azure blob storage.

fields.label: Markdown Header Depth
fields.tooltip: Specifies the max header depth that will be considered while grouping markdown content.

fields.label: Markdown Parsing Submode
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether a markdown file will be parsed into exactly one document or multiple documents.

fields.label: Parsing Mode
fields.tooltip: Represents the parsing mode for indexing from an Azure blob data source.

fields.label: PDF Text Rotation Algorithm
fields.tooltip: Determines algorithm for text extraction from PDF files in Azure blob storage.

fields.label: Query Timeout
fields.tooltip: Increases the timeout beyond the 5-minute default for Azure SQL database data sources, specified in the format hh:mm:ss.
